thread.title: Fright Town 2015: Ghoulish fun in three big rooms (photos, video)
thread.title_full: Fright Town 2015: Ghoulish fun in three big rooms (photos, video) | OregonLive.com

author: Thomas Boyd | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Fright Town 2015: Ghoulish fun in three big rooms (photos, video)
text:
Fright Town 2015 Scary scenes from Fright Town 2015.
Scary scenes from Fright Town 2015. Thomas Boyd | The Oregonian/OregonLive
If you want to be terrified at every turn and by all sorts of ghoulish, demented, bloody and undead miscreants, then by all means, go to Fright Town .
Here's a post from Jamie Hale on other haunted houses .
If you think you'll survive, Fright Town opens at 7p.m. on the following dates, unless noted:
Thursday, October 22nd.
Saturday, October 24th, Fright Town opens at 6 p.m.
Saturday, October 31. The final night.
-Thomas Boyd | tboyd@oregonian.com
Twitter: @thomasboyd | Instagram: @thomasrboyddotcom
